content.detailedDescription: I was walking out to my car from my parents house, looked up at the stars and saw a black triangle blocking out the light from behind it. it was hard to see with the naked eye, but not impossible. just hard to find. it moved in a straight line at the same height and speed as a helicopter. i tried to show my wife, but she couldnt see it in time, and then i lost it behind some trees; and that was it. the craziest part about it was that there was zero noise from the thing! 2 minutes after spotting it a helicopter flew by overhead.
content.summary: Silent black triangle moving at the speed of a helicopter - no noise - crazy

content.detailedDescription: I was fulling truck on tuesday about 2:05pm saw very shiny object hovering above ontario ca.When tank was full i drove truck to  dock n walked to office threw back door and ufo was now hovering lower than earlier.. saw another employee and asked him if wanted to see ufo and he said yes.We went outside it was gone.
content.summary: Ufo above ontario ca

content.detailedDescription:
I was traveling east bound on the 22 freeway on the morning of october 22, 2014.  between 6:00am and 6:30 am i was on the overpass transition from the 22 freeway to the 55 north and witnessed what looked like a bright light.  it appeared to be a contrail but it was not getting any larger.   

i grabbed my camera and snapped a photo.  i have no clue if it is just a contrail or what it is....

attached are photographs.  one is the original file from my phone and the second one i enlarged the image in a photo program to get a better look myself.

looks like a contrail... but not sure as it did not move or spread-out.....
content.summary: Looked like contrail from plane

content.detailedDescription: I was standing on my porch around 8:30 pm when i saw one redish orange orb appear low in the northwest sky. soon after it appeared, another one appeared off to the right of it at a slight lower elevation. the first one went away followed by the second one. this occurred once more.
content.summary: Redish orange orbs in the northwest sky

content.detailedDescription: It was like big ball with soud like super sonic plan to fast stop a litrl bit for 5 second then go fast again and i lose my tv sgnal at that time i haw dich satelite
content.summary: It was like big ball with soud like super sonic plan to fast stop a litrl bit for 5 second then go fast again and i lose my tv sgnal at that time i haw dich satelite

content.detailedDescription:
I was twelve years old in the summer of 1958. while on a boy scout camping trip we (all four or five scouts and our scout master)observed an object that looked like a star but it was moving slowly from the northeast to the southwest in a straight line across the sky. as we lay there watching it thinking it was "sputnik" one of the scouts shouted there's another one! sure enough coming from the opposite direction (from the southwest to the northeast) but far away from the first, was a second object, also moving about the same slow speed and in a straight line on a collision course with the first object. as we watched we picked sides each saying "my ship is going to destroy your ship" etc...  just as the two came within what appeared to the eye to be 3/4 of an inch apart a flash of light was transmitted between the two objects. it was impossible to tell from which object the flash came. however, the second object (the one on the left) disappeared and the first object continued it's course without change of direction or speed. 

at first we were stunned, then we all began shouting at once. our scout master seemed as shocked as the rest of us but refused to talk about it. i would be interested in knowing if other people witnessed this event.
content.summary: Member of a scout troop that observed two ufo's engage and one disappear following a flash between them.

content.detailedDescription:
A black object in front the sun two days in a row, off my deer camera in the back yard.
a motion sensor has to trigger a photo to be taken and there was no other image in front of the camera that moved, just the black orb.
content.summary: Photo off my deer camera in my back yard on date indicated on photo, date on my camera was one day off, it was the day before, two different dates. black object in front the sun.

content.detailedDescription:
Diving home on dekalb street in lake station, indiana.I noticed a black disc hovering that then began to move with us while we drove heading towards pine village mobile home park. it was rocking from left to right almost as if that is how it got moving/speed. -it was disc shaped and then picked up speed and left eye site  heading towards hobart indiana towards liverpool rd.

earlier and later that day i recorded tons of activity in the sky from lines of white clouds (smoke like) appearing and shooting down from the sky to earth and i even recorded 1 moving upward. later that day we ran to the store and that is when i noticed the disc.
content.summary: Diving home on dekalb i noticed a black disc hovering that then began to move with us while rocking from left to right -it was disc shaped and then picked up speed and left eyesite heading towards hobart indiana

content.detailedDescription:
My motion activated webcam pointed roughly east, but upwards close to the zenith, about 75-85°.  the video starts in daylight so you can see the large area of sky its showing. the top right object in all frames is the edge of the roof of my deck. the trees visible are large maples standing roughly 80+ feet high.  

the video starts 10/17/14 in daytime, cycles through night/daytime until 10/22/14. in the first minutes of the video, on the night of 10/17-18/14, there is a small white light caught by the cameras infrared: i believe this to be a spider or bug. im not positive, but thats what it looks like. i capture bugs, leaves blowing, birds/bats/raindrops quite a lot, so i know what they generally look like on "film". if you zoom in you can see little appendages which i guess to be spider legs as i've seen them in the pictures captured often.  if you look at the timestamp (top left), later in the video at about 21:00 hours,the next night on 10/18/14 is when the anomalous object appears.  
 
we were away for the weekend, which is peculiar as i captured an orb sighting on this webcam while we were away from home once before (not as long lasting, though much larger and apparently closer), about two years ago (never reported this one from two years ago). i have the webcam setup to record jpg files named sequentially each time motion is detected and storing a single jpg for each capture. unfortunately they are rather low resolution, 640x480. with software i combined the jpg's into a motion picture at 1 frame per second. the webcam timestamps each picture, so you can read the time of each picture giving a sense of realtime movement of this object. what makes this orb recording particularly interesting are a number of facts: 

at the end of the sequence you can see daylight breaking, and can see this object under the clouds.  

i was staying 3 hours away, but i believe it was mostly cloudy that night. it certainly was when daybreak comes and we can see the object in front of the clouds. we can be assured it was not a celestial object. i have seen the moon captured by this webcam many times.. it is usually much smaller (about 1/2 or less the size of this object), and of course the moon roughly follows the ecliptic - which this object doesn't do as indicated by the many hours of movements captured.

the object seems to give off a reflection that seems to light up the clouds or sky below it. there sometimes appear to be two faint objects (below it) that follow the object (or stay roughly the same distance from it) in various parts of the video. these two lights (many times fainter) appear different than the sometimes seen "reflection", although its hard to say if this is also reflection.  

i can provide the individual pictures that comprised the video as well, if requested.
content.summary: Hovering light caught by webcam that captures motion. 8+ hours.

content.detailedDescription:
Hello!
my name is [name removed/cms/tg] and i am from sweden. i have just published my book [book title removed/cms/tg]. in this book i write about my first meeting with [book title removed/cms/tg] and how i started in hypnosis the purpose was to gain access to childhood memories to see if i had had contact with extraterrestrials then. it was in hypnosis and also in meditation forgotten memories came up.
it was during the summer 1996 that i experienced something very special, and what happened really got me to wake up. my life didn't change externally, but within me a lot happened. my story extends over several years and sometimes it was hard to believe that what i had experienced was true, but i experienced it like this.
the first meeting was a beautiful summer evening the 17th of june 1996 and it was approaching 7:30pm. i was on my way home. the sky was bright blue and the sun was still warming. 
i glanced up into the sky and saw an object which i thought was an airplane, but there was something strange with this plane, so i had to stop and look closer. 
i wondered what it could be, because it was hanging quite still in the sky. the airplane was quite silent, not a sound and there was no engine droning. there were no wings, but possibly tail wings and a strong sun reflection was shining from the metallic side. it was a very different airplane. 
i had never seen anything similar hanging so quietly in the air and i was almost expecting it to fall down to the ground. it was just as strange, as if the moon suddenly would race in full speed in the sky.
     when i first met [book title removed/cms/tg], it was like falling into something i did not know existed in reality. i thought that this kind of events happen to others, but not me. it was a shocking experience , which i then did not know would lead to so much; gaining access to knowledge and information that involve  broader vision and wider understanding of who we are, we humans.

kind regards
[name removed/cms/tg]

[book title removed/cms/tg], amazon.Com
content.summary: Read the book [title and author removed/cms/tg]:  amazon.Com

content.detailedDescription: I wrote nasa once about this when i lived in woodbine and i stopped seeing them. i have moved sense then and have started seeing them again. the objects that i see at night are usually coming from a larger vessel, even though the larger vessel looks like a satellite to me. i can tell which one they are going to from because it will get really bright and then you can see the smaller ones start coming out, sometimes just one at a time and then sometimes several at a time. i really believe it is the governments ships that they don't want us to know about. i kind of believe once you get this i will not see them anymore here.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Seems like there is a larger ship they come from have seen as many as20 or 30 come from this larger one and see them pretty well every night

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 18:15 on tuesday 10/21/14, i was driving westbound on i-235 in west des moines, iowa at 60 mph. i was driving a 2009 ford focus. i was in the lane that eventually directs drivers into the i-80/35 northbound exit.   i noticed in the distance a bright light reflecting in the sunlight as the sun was just setting.  then, i saw a dimmer light off to it's left. then a third light appeared and "danced" around the other two lights, which were now about the same brightness, before they formed a triangle formation for a few seconds before breaking off the formation.  the third light disappeared but the other two were still visible before the second light disappeared leaving just the original object.  this entire sighting lasted from just west of 35th street in west des moines to the west mixmaster.  i would estimate that the objects somewhere over 60th and 74th streets in west des moines and roughly south of interstate 80.  i would estimate the objects to be hovering and moving slowly westward around 30-40 degrees above the horizon.  i had to keep moving as i was working so i lost sight of the last object once i was driving northbound on i-235.  my immediate feelings were that what i have seen on different tv shows over the years was now confirmed by my own two eyes in person.  
 
additionally, at approximately, 19:25, while waiting for red traffic lights to change to green at the intersections of third streets and second streets near downtown des moines and the i-235 exit (a long exit), i looked up to my left and saw a moving light moving slowly eastbound with no red or green position light or any stobes.  as i was turning on to second avenue to go northbound, the lighted object disappeared from my sight.  i would estimate the object to be around 2,000 feet msl.
 
further,i have observed bright lights for a few seconds only to disappear quickly several times over saylorville lake in recent years and once while exiting i-35 northbound and oralabor road in ankeny, iowa about 1.5 months ago.

finally, just last week, i had a dream and there was an alien in it.  the alien was friendly.  it had wet skin with no hair but was humanoid.
also, as i was driving on to cherry glen court (a block from my house) at approximately 2:30 a.M. sunday 10-19-14, a large owl swooped down and almost hit the top of my car.  the owl was moving in the same direction as my car so all i saw was the back of the owl but it was definitely an owl.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Driving westbound on i-235.  saw one orb. then another they hovered and moved slowly in sky.  then third appeared. third danced around the other two then the three formed a triangle.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my porch staring at the night sky facing south. a bright light flashed (strobe light like) twice rapidly over my back yard area and what seemed rather low, ive never seen anything like this and i watch out over this area frequently. it seemed like 5 seconds later with no sound at all the 2 white flashes of lights blinked again but now they were what seemed half a mile to a mile away( the term light speed came to mind). another 5 seconds went by and i think i may have saw the 2 flashes again but it was to far to be certain. like i said i watch this area of night sky frequently and have never seen anything like this,the quietness and speed of this object has blown my mind..I cant stop thinking about this thing.
content.summary: Bright white light, flashed twice in front of me and flew off at light speed and blinked 2 more times i could see and then lost sight of it. made no noise at all and flew off faster then anything man made could

content.detailedDescription: I was on my front porch and all of a sudden i noticed the sky got really dark in a certain area my lights flickered my cell phone was scrammbled and i looked up at the sky and seen a really large diamond shaped object with pulsating lights flying towards my house it stopped and just started hovering over the power lines in front of my house then i noticed to more objects hovering in behind it the one behind this one was also diamond shaped and had pulsating lights it had lights on the inside of this dome looking thing the third one was round it also had lights all over it just blinking my dogs went crazy astarted barking and growling i tried yo take a picture of the objects but my phone e wouldn't work so i just stood there observing them and they were maybe 500 feet above me if that they hoovered all over my neighbors field and then the next thing i know is i just see 3 steaks of light shoot over top of my house and they were gone
content.summary: Outside on front porch and the sky got really dark all of a sudden i looked up and seen 3 objects in sky one was round and the other ones were diamond shaped with pulsating lights

content.detailedDescription: App. time 651pm
content.summary: M sleeping bags we spotted 2 flying objects flying m any miles above us and then they shot away in a second.About 10mieuted later is ehen we sxay the ufo vert close that im reporting

content.detailedDescription: Flying in line. turn and disapeared
content.summary: 8 round yellow orange fringed circles

content.detailedDescription:
My friend and husband were in the backyard. i was upstairs where i looked from a window. then went into yard with them.
my friend saw it and called to us. 
a fireball.
it wasn't visible when moving. it would light up and then disappear till reaching its next point. it formed a w kind of. 
we were scared, shocked, and amazed. we did want tell others but not many believed us. we did find a few others in the area that omitted they saw the same object. we live in a large city. i'm sure there are others who have witnessed this as well. there were also planes flying as well. this object did not resemble anything we have ever saw before. i though the world was ending. 
it ascended back into space
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Object looking like fireball entered sky.It hovered for a few seconds. then moved in a zig zag way. while moving it wasn't visible. then ascended

content.detailedDescription:
Update on 1st report...Found the napkin i had drawn the object on...I showed my friend and he looked it up online and found it. me: that's it! that's what i saw!
i was driving home from fullerton ca to redlands ca. it was about 3-3:30am. i drive past a valley that normally has lights and a community and noticed that the majority of the lights were out, or so i thought. the object was so big it blocked out a wide and very long piece of the valley. it was so big i didn't realize what i was seeing...A boomerang, silent and several red unblinking lights(6-9?), very dark in color (matte black)& stationary. the red lights were the only lights across the valley in the middle and i thought it odd...Why lights there but nowhere else where it appeared to be a blackout? it was a bit lower than the freeway...I saw it from it's right wing which looked similar to the end of a plane's but huge. i finally found the picture i had drawn for my friend who's into youtube. he found the arizona lights video and i was amazed to be looking at it again!! 
rz
 *we, as a species, are very young. those that don't believe are fooling themselves that a universe is only capable of creating life on one plant and that "time" started when we did.
content.summary: Arizona lights (before i saw report about

content.detailedDescription: We were headed home from a friends house, around 7:50pm.  the sky was very clear, and you could see many stars.  i noticed what appeared to be 3 planes, flying oddly close to each other.  two were blinking rapidly in a bluish/green color, and the 3rd. in bright white.  after observing for about a minute i realized that they were all moving together, and formed a triangle pattern.  the blinking of the lights went from one to the next, to the next.  as i was pointing it out to my 9 year old daughter, they vanished.  a moment later they were replaced by two sets of huge orange lights.  each set had 3 lights in it, in a straight line.  they hovered, and then moved independently from each other.  my husband was driving in a vehicle ahead of me, and as my daughter and i were remarking about the lights and trying to figure out what they may be, my husband started backing down the road toward us.  it was apparent that he'd seen them as well and was trying to get a better look.  about that time they descended rapidly toward the tree line, and then disappeared.  my husband began to drive off, and i looked all around for the lights.  they were now directly behind my in my review mirror.  i floored the car in fear and when i looked in the review mirror again they had disappeared.  this is the second time we've seen lights like this in this area.  the first was a few months ago, and about a mile west of this sighting.  the lights that time were also huge and orange, but moved in a "leapfrog" type pattern, with no more than two lights visable at a time.  then they sped off faster than any plane could ever go.  directly after that, to the southeast, i saw a blue light shoot up from the ground, or possibly one of our many lakes in the area (there are like 60 of them), and then disappear.  this was back at the end of june or beginning of july, so we've blamed it on odd fireworks this whole time, but i've never seen any sort of fireworks like that, and there are woods where we saw the orange lights, so there shouldn't have been fireworks.
content.summary: Saw 3 weird lights flashing in a pattern, forming triangle the second they disappeared 2 sets of 3 huge orange lights appeared, ea. in a boomerang pattern. they hovered, zoomed, showed up behind us, then disappeared. this is the 2nd. sighting here.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving to work at 5:15am when i saw what was similar to a shooting star except it was gold in color and much too low to be one.  it was kind of like a roman candle shot from above my car to the ground.  a few seconds later i saw what appeared to be lights above the ground.  since i was on a highway i thought that it was a truck coming toward me in the other lane.  a few moments later, i realized that this thing was in the sky at a low altitude.  i watched as it passed me.  it was huge, had lights in a circular manner and i could see the craft above the lights.  at least i think that that was it.  it passed slowly above me.  i kept looking at the clock in my car to make sure that i didn't have missing time.  i have no idea why i thought this.  i don't know why i did that.  as i looked in my rear view mirror, it was still floating, for lack of a better word.  i gradually lost sight of the alleged craft.
content.summary: Ufo sighting in nebraska

content.detailedDescription:
Friday, october 17, between 8:10pm and 8:15pm, morgantown, west virginia - over south park area. large, white orb of light hovers then darts from northwest sky to western sky where it disappeared in the distance. the sky was cloudy, but there is always a great deal of ambient light in our area coming from the downtown area and a nearby mall complex.

my wife was standing on the front porch of our house, looking north-west. she was waiting for a car to come down the street to drop my son off from a birthday party. she noticed a large, “softball sized,” white orb below the cloud cover. possibly 250-400 feet above the ground and maybe four or five blocks north of our house. it was hovering/hanging in the sky when she first spotted it. as she tried to comprehend and understand what she was looking at, it darted away, and crossed the entire sky/horizon in under a second. it did not leave a visible trail or change directions. at first she thought it was a star or low flying plane, but realized it was a round orb of light. it dashed across the sky in a straight line, and she thought it traveled horizontally without gaining or losing altitude. moved at such a fast speed, she is confident it was not a helicopter, drone or plane. it had the appearance of a shooting star except it started from a dead stop. it was also eerily quiet outside that evening and the object made no noticeable noise either while hovering or moving across the sky.
content.summary: White orb of light, hovered then darted away over south park, morgantown

content.detailedDescription: I was in covelo, ca. working on a job with my son and a friend. we stayed at the golden oaks motel #9 late in the evening i went to the bathroom and didn't turn on the light because i didin't want to wake up everyone. i opened  the bathroom window. i saw a red light the seemed to be morphing into multiple red light of similar size a shape. there was also a white light that looked like a star that was directly underneath a powerline in the distance. i knelt down to see if it was just a star in the sky but the object did not move? then i stepped up on my tippy toes and the object remained where it was, just under the power line? this object seemed to be following me or tricking me? i woke up my friend and he witnessed the same thing i did with awe! he went back to sleep and i was very intrigued and refused to go directly to sleep until i've explained this somehow? i layed in bed and looked out my window. eventually i started to see these white lights that changed to a dull red, they looked like stars moving around in the sky. i pulled out my phone and started to record what i was seeing. these lights began to morph into many similar lights and explode outwards, only to come back together morphing back into one solid light? these light showed extreme intelligence in the patterns they were moving in. what i witnessed that night i will never forget. i have 47 minutes of video footage from my phone of this event. i have seen the video several times and if you have good vision you can see these these lights and some of there movements. i hope that i can have this video analysed professionally and that we can use some professional program to really see these objects as i was seeing them with my own eyes. they were very far away, but if we can zoom in and find a way to brighten these object, i'm convinced that this will be the most compelling video footage of intelligent life. i have this video on my phone and i wish to be present when it is analysed. i hope to hear from you soon. thanks, [name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: The most compelling evidence ever!

content.detailedDescription: I was observing the lunar surface on october 17 2014 at 0748 in the morning when a huge glowing object darted from the surface of the moon. the object is massive compared with the lunar surface. the ufo darted out at a 45degre angle and stayed stationary. then it started to move and cloak or try to disappear but the images that i have show just how long and big this un human craft maybe. i wanted to tell the story and show the photos because people in the intelligence dept. do not want me to show them because i was told it may cause anxiety among people and panic. if interested contact me i have many good photos that will answer questions. this object is between 500 miles to 1500 miles wide.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Watched it take off from lunar surface have plenty of pictures  500miles wide or more

content.detailedDescription:
We where at my summer cottage at the gulf of bothnia in ostrobothnia. i went out due to strange huge light phenomena around unusual large moon. went back inside to get my friend to come look and got any "cameras" existing in the house to capture the light phenomenons.

large orbital objects in atmosphere cough on pictures with 3 different devices. nokia lumia 520, nokia lumia 800, ipad air)

first thoughts where that the moon was in the wrong place or some strange atmospherically event or meteors entering the atmosphere caused a light show. 

later we surmised that it had to be stars close to the moon due to the clear autumn air but as they blinked in and out and moved farther from the moon moving in union and also more similar objects appeared farther out in the atmosphere we thought that it might be asteroids. but as the following objects also followed the same projector as the first lights it could not be asteroids as they where not burning up or moving in to the atmosphere but rather staying stationary for some time before changing places like controlled satellites only extremely larger then any satellites we have ever seen.  

we lost sight of the orbital objects as they changed form from dots to cone shaped to cigar shaped and suddenly stopped reflecting sunlight same as the moon reflects the sunlight.

we took some pictures in the later stages before the objects vanished from sight.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Large orbital objects in atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: After attending my niece's birthday party at clayton community park in claton, california opposite mt diablo, i went to the parking area to leave. i could observe the mountain side from where my car was parked. i took three photos of the mountain around 3:45pm. i did not see the object at the time. the horizontal lines on the pyramid shaped mountain were interesting to me. after downloading the photos to my computer i discovered the strange brown object in the third shot. the object looked like it was cruising along or hovering in place. it's difficult to judge as this is a still photo. i was shocked to see the object in the photo as i didn't see it while shooting it. i have heard that ufos are often seen around mining areas.
content.summary: After attending my niece's birthday party at clayton community park opposite mt diablo i took 3 photos of the mountain because the   horizontal lines on the pyramid shaped mountain   were interesting to me. the first two photos   were uneventful.

content.detailedDescription: Noticed bright light to west at sunset. first thought maybe venus or a plane.... then noticed a more dim light to it's right which then accelerated and went out of view in a couple seconds at a right angle to the north. the original bright light fadef out of view slowly to the west in a few minutes.
content.summary: Small light following bright light to west.. small light made right turn and accelerated quickly away at right angle while bright light fadef

content.detailedDescription:
March 7th 1986 and i driving a 1972 dodge charger going to phoenix az. from san diego on hwy 8 with a fellow navy guy by the name of mike adams. it was a clear night with almost no moon. 
    50 to 70 mile past yuma az.  mike said look at the radio tower south east of us. it was two red lights one over the other out in the middle of the desert. 
       we tried to tune in the radio to see if it was broadcasting anything and it wasn't and i was not surprised. 
 we drove on and mike was telling me that it was getting closer to the road and i was laugfing at him and telling him the radio towers don't move and the road was getting closer to the tower. 
 i was driving so i didn't watch it as much as mike was and a few minutes later he said it was getting closer to the road ahead. the road was straight and you could see cars ahead going west towards us. i started watching it more and more and i too could see it moving and it was a lot closer and smaller than i thought. mike said that it was going to cross the road and i was already slowing down so i could get a better look at the thing.
 we slowed down to a crawl and i got as close to the thing as i could and we watched it float over the road in front of my car about 20 feet from bing under it. 
 as it passed over the road my car was right beside it as it floated over the dirt median.  i was looking up at it at a 45 degree angle. it was about 10 feet off the ground and about 15 to 20 feet tall. and the with as 2.5 to 3 feet wide at it's widest part.  it was tapered at both ends. it was like a black hole. non-reflective.
     we watched it float to the other side of the road and lower itself to about 3 feet off the ground and turn on a light that looked like a 4 inch round circle of glass attached to 3 metal i-beams that came to a point. no wires. no sound and no dust in the light that came from the thing. the light on the ground was pure white light with a razor sharp edge to it. the 4 inch disk started to scan around the desert floor as if was looking for something. it moved around the plants and it was the most graceful thing i have ever seen. mike and i watched it go off into the desert until it was out of sight.    
 the files are illustrations i made of what i saw.
content.summary: Looked like a black tube tapered at both ends 15 to 20 feet tall red light on top and bottom. white 4 inch round disk spot light  on the bottom.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting on west exposure deck reading.  early afternoon, nice, partly cloudy. i noticed what looked like exhaust stream from the bottom of this long cigar shaped clouded with a dark top.  i thought this was very unusual indeed. first i thought it was a silly cloud formation, but then i got the binoculars and took a closer look.  the exhaust was streaming down in two very distinctive trails.  it was almost as though there was a cloak on something bigger to produce the two distinctive trails. it just moved along as though it was part of the normal makeup of clouds.  but just didn't look right.
i felt silly for thinking this could be anything other than normal clouds, but there was just something about this formation that bothered me, so i took video, and pictures. every time i look at these pictures i still think something is amiss.  formation simply rode along with the speed of the wind pushing the clouds.  see what you think.
content.summary: Exhaust seen from bottom of cigar shaped dark and white cloud

content.detailedDescription:
I walked out onto my north facing deck at 5:00pm on a cloudless 23 degree fall day. i looked up to the northwest where i saw this slow moving white object moving east to west at a steady but not fast pace. the object was shaped like a sail with a triangle mirror image shape below it separated by a small gap. ultimately it was like a white diamond shape with a tilt to it and a space between the two halves.
i observed it for approx. one minute before it disappeared over the west horizon of my view. i even had time to run in and get my automatic digital camera but it could not focus on the object in the nothing blue sky. no con trail at all. a single engine airplane flew by approx 30 sec. after losing sight of the object. it was unaware of the objects presence. (the image attached was taken of the view i had 20 min after the actual sighting just to capture the scenario.)

(update) at 6:23 pm the same day i saw this craft again. it was now dark outside and it was brilliantly illuminated and moving west to east at approx the same height and speed as before. this time the flight path was to the south of my location. this time the upper portion of the craft seemed much brighter than the bottom.

this the seventh sighting i've had since my first in 1997. i've seen everything from cigar shaped objects to black triangles to orbs and black barrels in my experiences. time to get a camera i can focus manually!
content.summary: Sail with a triangle mirror image shape below

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my friend on the rooftop of my 2 storey house. we had come back after drinking beer and eating dinner. and just to clarify we weren't drunk or anything cause i had drove back and it was just a couple of beers anyway. 
so we were sitting on the rooftop, just talking about our days in school and how our college life was going on. we sat there for a good 40 mins talking about random stuff and reminiscing about our childhood and how amazing that time was. let's name my friend "john" cause he isn't aware of my decision to report this.
anyway so john starts telling me about how a few days back when he got drunk at his girlfriend's house and went outside to pee on a tree(for some stupid reason), he saw a reddish object flying in the air which first ascended and then descended and he was going about how cool that was. and i was thinking to myself what the hell's he's talking about and was just amused. after a couple of minutes i was just staring towards my right and looking towards a 'red star'. my friend was looking somewhere else at that moment. 
so i was looking at this star and thinking about his stupid story and how amusing it was. (the star wasn't very high like the other star, but it was high enough in the sky to not be some man made 'light bulb'.) so i stared at it for a couple of seconds and suddenly it blinked and there was darkness over there. so i asked my friend to look and after a couple of seconds it came back. this time both of us were staring at it and it stayed 'on' for like 5-6 seconds and this time it went 'off' in a very dramatic way. i can't explain the feeling but this time it went off in a way which said it won't come back on again. and that's what exactly happened. we stayed over there for 10-15 mins looking towards it. it didn't come back. 
also i'm not sure but the star was there all the while before it blinked, cause i might have looked towards it but not paying a lot of attention to it.

also i'm not saying that was a ufo or something. it was something strange so i decided to report it. also there were no clouds over there which could have obstructed it's view. it couldn't be a tower or man made light cause it was too high. it couldn't be an airplane cause the light wasn't moving. it was stationary for too long to be an airplane or sattelite.
content.summary: A bright red star which i started staring towards. after 5 seconds it blinked and it was gone. i was still staring at it and asked my friend to look as well. after a couple of seconds it came back and we were staring at it again. and thensuddenly vanished
